title: MP Amarakeerthi Athukorala commit suicide
body_lines: Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) Polonnaruwa District Parliamentarian Amarakeerthi Athukorala has alledgely committed sucide.
A vehicle allegedly belonging to MP Amarakeerthi Athukorala was seen attacked by the people in Nittambuwa.
CCTV footegages near the area shows MP Athukorla is running for safety.
He was reportedly hidden in a building where he had reportedly committed suicide.
